ygData.subject: Re: Intro
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks, Elahana dear.  Well, the move was an adventure and a half (I moved from the NW corner of the country to one of the SE states, so believe me on this
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks, Elahana dear. Well, the move was an adventure and a half (I moved from
the NW corner of the country to one of the SE states, so believe me on this
one), and I'm glad to have it over with, but I did enjoy the scenery along the
way and it gave me lots of time to think. I decided I'm looking forward to it
being just me and my kids for a bit. Sometimes concentrating on another adult
is just too much darned work. =)

Romney Nunley wrote:

> From: "Romney Nunley" <elahana@...>
>
> Good luck on your move Sara. I hope you make it safely and I can relate.
> It's good that you have family to support you when you need them. =) We hope
> to hear from you soon.
>
